title: shrI kamalAmbikE shivE pAhimAm lalitE
sahitya:
P:  shrI kamalAmbikE shivE pAhimAm lalitE shrIpati vinutE sitAsitE shiva sahitE
(samaSThi caraNa)
rAkA candramukhI rakSita kOlamukhI ramAvANI sakhI rAjayOga sukhI shAkambari 
shAtOdari candrakalAdhari shaHNkari shankara guruguha bhakta vashankari EkAkSari 
bhuvanEshvari Isha priyakari shrIkari sukhakari shrI mahAtripura sundari
